content: An offer from our fiends at XP.

embeds.title: Official XP Lotto & Sweepstakes
embeds.description: a syndicate lottery group dedicated to the success of the XP community.

footer.text: Read all rules & instructions x2 before sending any coins. No refunds for coins sent in wrong amounts and/or wrong address.

actions.text:
**XP Lotto:**
- **30k XP** per ticket.
- XP Lotto consists of two drawing types: regular drawings and guaranteed drawings. 
 - Regular drawings take place whenever 30 or more XP Lottery tickets have been sold. 
 - Guaranteed drawings take place on the last drawing day of the calendar month if no regular drawings have occurred in that month and tickets have been purchased in that month. 
 - In short, guaranteed drawings ensure that there is at least one drawing per month as long as a ticket has been purchased that month. 
- The lottery in which the program participates is determined by the highest jackpot available as all other things like odds and price are the same.


**XP Sweepstakes:**
- Sweep consists of two drawings: regular and fauceteers.
 - **10k XP** per ticket for regular sweepstakes.
 - **100 XP** per ticket for Fauceteer sweepstakes. 
- They operate on the same rules but have different participation costs. 
- Winners are drawn every two weeks (alternating each week).

- To participate in the pool, generate a Lotto Address only at 
 - https://experiencepoints.io/lotto/.
- Participants are required to provide an XP Winnings Address for small pool wins and a BTC Winnings Address for large pool wins.
- There's no limit to deposit amounts.
- **All deposits are final.**
- Deposits must be received 1 hour before the drawing to qualify for the drawing.
- If received late, the deposit will be applied to the next drawing.
- The same Lotto Address can be used for multiple drawings.
-If you lose access to your Winnings Addresses, generate a new Lotto Address with different Winnings Addresses.
Shares cost 30,000 XP each. (change effective 4/1/2023)
- Each participant's cut of the winnings is determined by their number of shares divided by the number of shares for the entire pool.
- **Partial shares are not recognized and will not be returned.**
